titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 6/17/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol.
